news_header: Hundreds of unauthorized individuals have been arrested and deported in the U.S. under the Trump administration.
news_text: In recent days, hundreds of unauthorized individuals have been arrested and deported in the United States. White House spokesperson Karoline Leavitt reported that the Trump administration has detained 538 people. Leavitt referred to these individuals as 'illegal immigrants' and noted that the administration has successfully executed a large deportation operation using military aircraft. Following his inauguration, Trump declared a national emergency at the southern border and increased military presence there.
